data.actual_result: It doesn’t let you select any text after pressing it
data.expected_result: The format button should not make you not able to select anything else after
data.short_description: When selecting text, and choosing “format” from the options, after pressing it, nothing happens and you’re not able to select any text afterwards
data.steps_to_repro: - Write something into the text sending box - Select it - Choose “format” from the options - Observe
